execution_plan.description: Find goods ids for lemon flavored cake
execution_plan.query: SELECT goods.id AS s1__id FROM goods WHERE goods.flavor = 'lemon' AND goods.food = 'cake';

execution_plan.description: Find receipts that include those goods (items.Item matches goods.id)
execution_plan.query: SELECT items.Receipt AS s2__Receipt, items.Item AS s2__Item FROM items WHERE items.Item IN ($step1.s1__id);

execution_plan.description: Get customer ids for those receipts
execution_plan.query: SELECT receipts.ReceiptNumber AS s3__ReceiptNumber, receipts.CustomerId AS s3__CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE receipts.ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.s2__Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Return distinct customer ids from the matching receipts
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT receipts.CustomerId AS s4__CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE receipts.CustomerId IN ($step3.s3__CustomerId);
